13c400b9-f3d3-4df0-b86b-0bec6db67bf0.title: Thai fried rice with fruit and vegetables
13c400b9-f3d3-4df0-b86b-0bec6db67bf0.description: This Thai fried rice is loaded with chicken, egg and vegetables, all stir fried together in a savory sauce.

8a52898b-b15f-41af-88fc-e284b33156d3.title: Tomato & mascarpone risotto
8a52898b-b15f-41af-88fc-e284b33156d3.description: This comforting risotto is perfect for a weekend wind-down for special mid-week meal. Switch mascarpone with cream cheese for a cheaper alternative
